00069 /* FSMENU HANDLING */
00070 
00071     /* FSMenuEntry's without paths indicate seperators */
00072 typedef struct _FSMenuEntry FSMenuEntry;
00073 struct _FSMenuEntry {
00074     FSMenuEntry *next;
00075 
00076     char *path;
00077     short save;
00078 };
00079 
00080 typedef struct FSMenu
00081 {
00082     FSMenuEntry *fsmenu_system;
00083     FSMenuEntry *fsmenu_bookmarks;
00084     FSMenuEntry *fsmenu_recent;
00085 
00086 } FSMenu;
00087 
00088 static FSMenu *g_fsmenu = NULL;
00089 
00090 struct FSMenu* fsmenu_get(void)
00091 {
00092     if (!g_fsmenu) {
00093         g_fsmenu=MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct FSMenu), "fsmenu");
00094     }
00095     return g_fsmenu;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static FSMenuEntry *fsmenu_get_category(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category)
00099 {
00100     FSMenuEntry *fsms = NULL;
00101 
00102     switch(category) {
00103         case FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM:
00104             fsms = fsmenu->fsmenu_system;
00105             break;
00106         case FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS:
00107             fsms = fsmenu->fsmenu_bookmarks;
00108             break;
00109         case FS_CATEGORY_RECENT:
00110             fsms = fsmenu->fsmenu_recent;
00111             break;
00112     }
00113     return fsms;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void fsmenu_set_category(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category, FSMenuEntry *fsms)
00117 {
00118     switch(category) {
00119         case FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM:
00120             fsmenu->fsmenu_system = fsms;
00121             break;
00122         case FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS:
00123             fsmenu->fsmenu_bookmarks = fsms;
00124             break;
00125         case FS_CATEGORY_RECENT:
00126             fsmenu->fsmenu_recent = fsms;
00127             break;
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 int fsmenu_get_nentries(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category)
00132 {
00133     FSMenuEntry *fsme;
00134     int count= 0;
00135 
00136     for (fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category); fsme; fsme= fsme->next) 
00137         count++;
00138 
00139     return count;
00140 }
00141 
00142 char *fsmenu_get_entry(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category, int idx)
00143 {
00144     FSMenuEntry *fsme;
00145 
00146     for (fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category); fsme && idx; fsme= fsme->next)
00147         idx--;
00148 
00149     return fsme?fsme->path:NULL;
00150 }
00151 
00152 short fsmenu_can_save (struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category, int idx)
00153 {
00154     FSMenuEntry *fsme;
00155 
00156     for (fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category); fsme && idx; fsme= fsme->next)
00157         idx--;
00158 
00159     return fsme?fsme->save:0;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void fsmenu_insert_entry(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category, const char *path, int sorted, short save)
00163 {
00164     FSMenuEntry *prev;
00165     FSMenuEntry *fsme;
00166     FSMenuEntry *fsms;
00167 
00168     fsms = fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category);
00169     prev= fsme= fsms;
00170 
00171     for (; fsme; prev= fsme, fsme= fsme->next) {
00172         if (fsme->path) {
00173             const int cmp_ret= BLI_path_cmp(path, fsme->path);
00174             if (cmp_ret == 0) {
00175                 return;
00176             }
00177             else if (sorted && cmp_ret < 0) {
00178                 break;
00179             }
00180         }
00181         else {
00182             // if we're bookmarking this, file should come 
00183             // before the last separator, only automatically added
00184             // current dir go after the last sep.
00185             if (save) {
00186                 break;
00187             }
00188         }
00189     }
00190     
00191     fsme= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*fsme), "fsme");
00192     fsme->path= BLI_strdup(path);
00193     fsme->save = save;
00194 
00195     if (prev) {
00196         fsme->next= prev->next;
00197         prev->next= fsme;
00198     }
00199     else {
00200         fsme->next= fsms;
00201         fsmenu_set_category(fsmenu, category, fsme);
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void fsmenu_remove_entry(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category, int idx)
00206 {
00207     FSMenuEntry *prev= NULL, *fsme= NULL;
00208     FSMenuEntry *fsms = fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category);
00209 
00210     for (fsme= fsms; fsme && idx; prev= fsme, fsme= fsme->next)     
00211         idx--;
00212 
00213     if (fsme) {
00214         /* you should only be able to remove entries that were 
00215          * not added by default, like windows drives.
00216          * also separators (where path == NULL) shouldn't be removed */
00217         if (fsme->save && fsme->path) {
00218 
00219             /* remove fsme from list */
00220             if (prev) {
00221                 prev->next= fsme->next;
00222             }
00223             else {
00224                 fsms= fsme->next;
00225                 fsmenu_set_category(fsmenu, category, fsms);
00226             }
00227             /* free entry */
00228             MEM_freeN(fsme->path);
00229             MEM_freeN(fsme);
00230         }
00231     }
00232 }
00233 
00234 void fsmenu_write_file(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, const char *filename)
00235 {
00236     FSMenuEntry *fsme= NULL;
00237     int nskip= 0;
00238 
00239     FILE *fp = BLI_fopen(filename, "w");
00240     if (!fp) return;
00241     
00242     fprintf(fp, "[Bookmarks]\n");
00243     for (fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS); fsme; fsme= fsme->next) {
00244         if (fsme->path && fsme->save) {
00245             fprintf(fp, "%s\n", fsme->path);
00246         }
00247     }
00248     fprintf(fp, "[Recent]\n");
00249     nskip = fsmenu_get_nentries(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_RECENT) - FSMENU_RECENT_MAX;
00250     // skip first entries if list too long
00251     for (fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_RECENT); fsme && (nskip>0); fsme= fsme->next, --nskip) {
00252         /* pass */
00253     }
00254     for (; fsme; fsme= fsme->next) {
00255         if (fsme->path && fsme->save) {
00256             fprintf(fp, "%s\n", fsme->path);
00257         }
00258     }
00259     fclose(fp);
00260 }
00261 
00262 void fsmenu_read_bookmarks(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, const char *filename)
00263 {
00264     char line[256];
00265     FSMenuCategory category = FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS;
00266     FILE *fp;
00267 
00268     fp = BLI_fopen(filename, "r");
00269     if (!fp) return;
00270 
00271     while ( fgets ( line, 256, fp ) != NULL ) /* read a line */
00272     {
00273         if (strncmp(line, "[Bookmarks]", 11)==0) {
00274             category = FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS;
00275         }
00276         else if (strncmp(line, "[Recent]", 8)==0) {
00277             category = FS_CATEGORY_RECENT;
00278         }
00279         else {
00280             int len = strlen(line);
00281             if (len>0) {
00282                 if (line[len-1] == '\n') {
00283                     line[len-1] = '\0';
00284                 }
00285                 if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00286                     fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, category, line, 0, 1);
00287                 }
00288             }
00289         }
00290     }
00291     fclose(fp);
00292 }
00293 
00294 void fsmenu_read_system(struct FSMenu* fsmenu)
00295 {
00296     char line[256];
00297 #ifdef WIN32
00298     /* Add the drive names to the listing */
00299     {
00300         __int64 tmp;
00301         char tmps[4];
00302         int i;
00303             
00304         tmp= GetLogicalDrives();
00305         
00306         for (i=0; i < 26; i++) {
00307             if ((tmp>>i) & 1) {
00308                 tmps[0]='A'+i;
00309                 tmps[1]=':';
00310                 tmps[2]='\\';
00311                 tmps[3]=0;
00312                 
00313                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, tmps, 1, 0);
00314             }
00315         }
00316 
00317         /* Adding Desktop and My Documents */
00318         SHGetSpecialFolderPath(0, line, CSIDL_PERSONAL, 0);
00319         fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu,FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00320         SHGetSpecialFolderPath(0, line, CSIDL_DESKTOPDIRECTORY, 0);
00321         fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00322     }
00323 #else
00324 #ifdef __APPLE__
00325     {
00326 #if (MAC_OS_X_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED <= MAC_OS_X_VERSION_10_4)
00327         OSErr err=noErr;
00328         int i;
00329         const char *home;
00330         
00331         /* loop through all the OS X Volumes, and add them to the SYSTEM section */
00332         for (i=1; err!=nsvErr; i++)
00333         {
00334             FSRef dir;
00335             unsigned char path[FILE_MAX];
00336             
00337             err = FSGetVolumeInfo(kFSInvalidVolumeRefNum, i, NULL, kFSVolInfoNone, NULL, NULL, &dir);
00338             if (err != noErr)
00339                 continue;
00340             
00341             FSRefMakePath(&dir, path, FILE_MAX);
00342             if (strcmp((char*)path, "/home") && strcmp((char*)path, "/net")) {
00343                 /* /net and /home are meaningless on OSX, home folders are stored in /Users */
00344                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, (char *)path, 1, 0);
00345             }
00346         }
00347 
00348         /* As 10.4 doesn't provide proper API to retrieve the favorite places,
00349          * assume they are the standard ones 
00350          * TODO : replace hardcoded paths with proper BLI_get_folder calls */
00351         home = getenv("HOME");
00352         if (home) {
00353             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/", home);
00354             fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00355             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/Desktop/", home);
00356             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00357                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00358             }
00359             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/Documents/", home);
00360             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00361                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00362             }
00363             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/Pictures/", home);
00364             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00365                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00366             }
00367             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/Music/", home);
00368             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00369                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00370             }
00371             BLI_snprintf(line, 256, "%s/Movies/", home);
00372             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00373                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00374             }
00375         }
00376 #else
00377         /* 10.5 provides ability to retrieve Finder favorite places */
00378         UInt32 seed;
00379         OSErr err = noErr;
00380         CFArrayRef pathesArray;
00381         LSSharedFileListRef list;
00382         LSSharedFileListItemRef itemRef;
00383         CFIndex i, pathesCount;
00384         CFURLRef cfURL = NULL;
00385         CFStringRef pathString = NULL;
00386         
00387         /* First get local mounted volumes */
00388         list = LSSharedFileListCreate(NULL, kLSSharedFileListFavoriteVolumes, NULL);
00389         pathesArray = LSSharedFileListCopySnapshot(list, &seed);
00390         pathesCount = CFArrayGetCount(pathesArray);
00391         
00392         for (i=0; i<pathesCount; i++)
00393         {
00394             itemRef = (LSSharedFileListItemRef)CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(pathesArray, i);
00395             
00396             err = LSSharedFileListItemResolve(itemRef, 
00397                                               kLSSharedFileListNoUserInteraction
00398                                               | kLSSharedFileListDoNotMountVolumes, 
00399                                               &cfURL, NULL);
00400             if (err != noErr)
00401                 continue;
00402             
00403             pathString = CFURLCopyFileSystemPath(cfURL, kCFURLPOSIXPathStyle);
00404             
00405             if (!CFStringGetCString(pathString,line,256,kCFStringEncodingASCII))
00406                 continue;
00407             fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, line, 1, 0);
00408             
00409             CFRelease(pathString);
00410             CFRelease(cfURL);
00411         }
00412         
00413         CFRelease(pathesArray);
00414         CFRelease(list);
00415         
00416         /* Then get network volumes */
00417         err = noErr;
00418         for (i=1; err!=nsvErr; i++)
00419         {
00420             FSRef dir;
00421             FSVolumeRefNum volRefNum;
00422             struct GetVolParmsInfoBuffer volParmsBuffer;
00423             unsigned char path[FILE_MAX];
00424             
00425             err = FSGetVolumeInfo(kFSInvalidVolumeRefNum, i, &volRefNum, kFSVolInfoNone, NULL, NULL, &dir);
00426             if (err != noErr)
00427                 continue;
00428             
00429             err = FSGetVolumeParms(volRefNum, &volParmsBuffer, sizeof(volParmsBuffer));
00430             if ((err != noErr) || (volParmsBuffer.vMServerAdr == 0)) /* Exclude local devices */
00431                 continue;
00432             
00433             
00434             FSRefMakePath(&dir, path, FILE_MAX);
00435             fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, (char *)path, 1, 0);
00436         }
00437         
00438         /* Finally get user favorite places */
00439         list = LSSharedFileListCreate(NULL, kLSSharedFileListFavoriteItems, NULL);
00440         pathesArray = LSSharedFileListCopySnapshot(list, &seed);
00441         pathesCount = CFArrayGetCount(pathesArray);
00442         
00443         for (i=0; i<pathesCount; i++)
00444         {
00445             itemRef = (LSSharedFileListItemRef)CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(pathesArray, i);
00446             
00447             err = LSSharedFileListItemResolve(itemRef, 
00448                                               kLSSharedFileListNoUserInteraction
00449                                               | kLSSharedFileListDoNotMountVolumes, 
00450                                               &cfURL, NULL);
00451             if (err != noErr)
00452                 continue;
00453             
00454             pathString = CFURLCopyFileSystemPath(cfURL, kCFURLPOSIXPathStyle);
00455             
00456             if (!CFStringGetCString(pathString,line,256,kCFStringEncodingASCII))
00457                 continue;
00458             fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00459             
00460             CFRelease(pathString);
00461             CFRelease(cfURL);
00462         }
00463         
00464         CFRelease(pathesArray);
00465         CFRelease(list);
00466 #endif /* OSX 10.5+ */
00467     }
00468 #else
00469     /* unix */
00470     {
00471         const char *home= getenv("HOME");
00472 
00473         if (home) {
00474             BLI_snprintf(line, FILE_MAXDIR, "%s/", home);
00475             fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00476             BLI_snprintf(line, FILE_MAXDIR, "%s/Desktop/", home);
00477             if (BLI_exists(line)) {
00478                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS, line, 1, 0);
00479             }
00480         }
00481 
00482         {
00483             int found= 0;
00484 #ifdef __linux__
00485             /* loop over mount points */
00486             struct mntent *mnt;
00487             int len;
00488             FILE *fp;
00489 
00490             fp = setmntent (MOUNTED, "r");
00491             if (fp == NULL) {
00492                 fprintf(stderr, "could not get a list of mounted filesystemts\n");
00493             }
00494             else {
00495                 while ((mnt = getmntent (fp))) {
00496                     /* not sure if this is right, but seems to give the relevant mnts */
00497                     if (strncmp(mnt->mnt_fsname, "/dev", 4))
00498                         continue;
00499 
00500                     len= strlen(mnt->mnt_dir);
00501                     if (len && mnt->mnt_dir[len-1] != '/') {
00502                         BLI_snprintf(line, FILE_MAXDIR, "%s/", mnt->mnt_dir);
00503                         fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, line, 1, 0);
00504                     }
00505                     else
00506                         fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, mnt->mnt_dir, 1, 0);
00507 
00508                     found= 1;
00509                 }
00510                 if (endmntent (fp) == 0) {
00511                     fprintf(stderr, "could not close the list of mounted filesystemts\n");
00512                 }
00513             }
00514 #endif
00515 
00516             /* fallback */
00517             if (!found)
00518                 fsmenu_insert_entry(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM, "/", 1, 0);
00519         }
00520     }
00521 #endif
00522 #endif
00523 }
00524 
00525 
00526 static void fsmenu_free_category(struct FSMenu* fsmenu, FSMenuCategory category)
00527 {
00528     FSMenuEntry *fsme= fsmenu_get_category(fsmenu, category);
00529 
00530     while (fsme) {
00531         FSMenuEntry *n= fsme->next;
00532 
00533         if (fsme->path) MEM_freeN(fsme->path);
00534         MEM_freeN(fsme);
00535 
00536         fsme= n;
00537     }
00538 }
00539 
00540 void fsmenu_free(struct FSMenu* fsmenu)
00541 {
00542     fsmenu_free_category(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_SYSTEM);
00543     fsmenu_free_category(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_BOOKMARKS);
00544     fsmenu_free_category(fsmenu, FS_CATEGORY_RECENT);
00545     MEM_freeN(fsmenu);
00546 }
